metadata.title: CVE-2024-52533 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: gio/gsocks4aproxy.c in GNOME GLib before 2.82.1 has an off-by-one error andresultant buffer overflow because SOCKS4_CONN_MSG_LEN is not sufficient fora trailing '\0' character.

criterions.comment: glib2.0 package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
